name: Escape room 1 - Text Based
description:
• A simple short escape room game.
  • You wake up and find yourself stuck in a room.
  • Choose the right answer and escape the room.

_________________________________________________________________________

  • Notes:

I'm hoping to make more types of escape room games. It might not always be text based, it could be with images in the future perhaps!

I'm not so sure what tags I should put in.. hopefully its okay. ^^; If you know any good tags to go with this, let me know! Would really like that!

This was made with Ren'py.

Thank you for taking the time to check this out! =D
